title: [PATCH]: Polly Bot Subtree Pull PR Workflow
author: Circuit-Overtime

gist.headline: Polly moves house
gist.blurb: Our helper bot Polly is moving to a new repo structure to keep things tidy and organized.
gist.summary: Refactored the Polly bot application into a git subtree configuration with automated daily sync workflows.
gist.impact: Keeps the monorepo clean while ensuring the bot stays up to date with upstream changes.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee mascot (Polly) carrying a small pixelated moving box labeled 'BOT' from a large hive to a cute smaller hive nearby. Represents the code moving to a subtree.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the cute bee mascot carrying a small pixelated box labeled 'BOT' towards a tiny separate digital hive. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.
